Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to extending the authorization of the county of Chemung to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Relates to extending the authorization of the county of Chemung to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes to November 30, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Chemung to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
